Uses of Class
edu.rit.draw.Drawing

  • Packages that use Drawing 
    Package Description
    edu.rit.draw
    Package edu.rit.draw contains classes and programs for drawing diagrams and slides of all kinds.
    edu.rit.draw.item
    Package edu.rit.draw.item contains classes for the different kinds of drawing items that can appear in a Drawing.

    • Uses of Drawing in edu.rit.draw

      Methods in edu.rit.draw that return Drawing 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Drawing Drawing.alignment(Drawing.Alignment theAlignment)
      Set this drawing's alignment.
      Drawing Drawing.background(ColorFill theBackground)
      Set this drawing's background color fill.
      Drawing Drawing.border(double theBorder)
      Set this drawing's display region's border.
      static Drawing Drawing.defaultDrawing()
      Returns the default drawing.
      static Drawing Drawing.read(File theFile)
      Read a drawing from the given file.
      static Drawing Drawing.read(String theFileName)
      Read a drawing from the file with the given name.
      Drawing Drawing.size(Size theSize)
      Set this drawing's display region's size.
      Methods in edu.rit.draw with parameters of type Drawing 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void Drawing.defaultDrawing(Drawing theDrawing)
      Set the default drawing.
      static void Drawing.write(Drawing theDrawing, File theFile)
      Write the given drawing to the given file.
      static void Drawing.write(Drawing theDrawing, String theFileName)
      Write the given drawing to the file with the given name.
